Transportasi Umum  Harus Ramah Lingkungan
01 Nov 2019, 07:40 by Windiyati Retno Sumardiyani
BOGOR, (PR).- Pemerintah Kota Bogor mencanangkan transportasi umum ramah lingkungan dalam waktu dekat ini. Wali Kota Bogor Bima Arya menyebutkan, sejauh ini transportasi menjadi penyumbang pencemaran polusi terbesar di Kota Bogor sehingga perlu ada upaya untuk menjadikan transportasi ramah lingkungan.
“Efek rumah kaca di Kota Bogor sudah kita cek penyebabnya apa saja, salah satunya transportasi. Kedua, keberadaan industri yang tidak banyak di Kota Bogor. Fokus ke depan, kita akan lebih menekan polusi pencemaran pada transportasi, makanya transportasi harus ramah lingkungan,” ujar Bima Arya, Jumat, 1 November 2019.
Bima mengatakan, dalam lima tahun ke depan, Pemerintah Kota Bogor memiliki misi mengurangi angkutan di dalam kota. Nantinya, angkutan tersebut akan dikonversi menjadi bus pengganti. Bus pengganti tersebut, kata Bima, yang ditargetkan bisa menjadi transportasi ramah lingkungan.
Selain program transportasi angkutan ramah lingkungan, Bima juga mengimbau masyarakat untuk bisa mengurangi penggunaan kendaraan pribadi, dan meningkatkan kegiatan penghijauan seperti pembuatan lubang biopori dan lainnya.
“Sebenarnya program ini sudah beberapa kali dilakukan, ada angkot yang sudah berbahan bakar gas. Nanti ke depan angkot akan diganti, nah bus itu nanti harus ramah lingkungan, salah satunya dengan mengganti bahan bakarnya dengan bahan bakar gas,” kata Bima.
Belum masif
Kepala Bidang Angkutan Dinas Perhubungan Kota Bogor Jimmy Hutapea mengatakan, sebenarnya program transportasi ramah lingkungan sudah terlaksana sejak beberapa waktu lalu. Menurut Jimmy, ratusan angkutan umum di Kota Bogor saat ini masih beroperasi menggunakan bahan bakar gas. Namun demikian, sosialisasi tentang angkutan umum berbahan gas ini tidak terlalu masif lantaran keterbatasan stasiun pengisian bahan bakar gas di Kota Bogor.
“Di Kota Bogor, SPBG baru ada dua, di Jalan Merdeka dan Bubulak. Makanya kami belum berani memaksakan angkot dengan gas. Kalau kita paksa mereka mengikuti program,  nanti mereka komplain, kenapa diwajibkan, tetapi  SPBG tidak tersedia di tempat-tempat yang mereka lalui,”  ujar Jimmy.
Tak hanya bahan bakar gas, penggunaan biodiesel untuk  moda transportasi Transpakuan juga pernah diberlakukan. Namun, angkutan dengan bahan bakar minyak jelantah setop beroperasi. Kini, salah satu solusi yang diharapkan dapat dikembangkan adalah kendaraan listrik. Jimmy berharap, ke depan kendaraan listrik bisa menjadi transportasi umum sehingga polusi di Kota Bogor bisa ditekan.
“Tahun ini kemungkinan ada angkutan bus yang sudah menggunakan listrik, tetapi kita belum tahu apakah  bisa beroperasi di Kota Bogor atau belum, biar pasar yang menentukan,” ucap Jimmy.***

Public Transportation Must Be Environmentally Friendly
01 Nov 2019, 07:40 by Windiyati Retno Sumardiyani
BOGOR, (PR) .- Bogor City Government has launched an environmentally friendly public transportation in the near future. Bogor Mayor Bima Arya said, so far transportation has been the biggest contributor to pollution in Bogor, so there needs to be an effort to make transportation environmentally friendly.
"We have checked the greenhouse effect in Bogor City, including transportation. Secondly, there are not many industries in Bogor City. The focus going forward, we will be more pressing pollution pollution on transportation, so transportation must be environmentally friendly, "said Bima Arya, Friday, November 1, 2019.
Bima said, in the next five years, the Bogor City Government has a mission to reduce transportation within the city. Later, the transportation will be converted into a replacement bus. The replacement buses, said Bima, are targeted to be environmentally friendly transportation.
In addition to environmentally friendly transportation transportation programs, Bima also appealed to the community to be able to reduce the use of private vehicles, and increase greening activities such as making biopori pits and others.
"Actually, this program has been done several times, there are public transportation that has been fueled by gas. In the future the angkot will be replaced, now the bus must be environmentally friendly, one of which is by replacing its fuel with gas fuel, "said Bima.
Not massive yet
Head of Transportation of Bogor City Transportation Department, Jimmy Hutapea, said that the environmentally friendly transportation program has been implemented for some time. According to Jimmy, hundreds of public transportation in the city of Bogor are still operating on natural gas. However, the socialization of public transportation made from gas is not too massive because of the limitations of gas refueling stations in the city of Bogor.
"In the city of Bogor, there are only two SPBGs, on Jalan Merdeka and Bubulak. So we have not dared to force public transportation with gas. If we force them to take part in the program, later they complain, why are they obliged, but SPBGs are not available in the places they pass, "Jimmy said.
Not only fuel gas, the use of biodiesel for transportation mode Transparency has also been enacted. However, transportation with used cooking oil stopped operating. Now, one solution that is expected to be developed is electric vehicles. Jimmy hopes, in the future electric vehicles can become public transportation so that pollution in the city of Bogor can be suppressed.
"This year there may be buses that use electricity, but we don't know whether they can operate in Bogor or not, so the market will determine," Jimmy said. ***
